name: concordialang-codeceptjs-webdriverio
description: Concordia Language plug-in to generate test scripts for CodeceptJS with WebDriverIO

scripts.switch:local: npm run switch:un && npm i ../concordialang-plugin && npm i ../concordialang-codeceptjs-core
scripts.switch:web: npm run switch:un && npm i concordialang-plugin concordialang-codeceptjs-core
scripts.test: echo "No tests in this package. They are in the `core` package."
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.postversion: echo "Rebase is recommended. Don't forget to push the tags." && git log --oneline
scripts.postinstall: npx selenium-standalone install || echo "!!! PROBABLY JAVA IS NOT INSTALLED !!!"
